title: Cookie Preferences
description: We use cookies to enhance your browsing experience, serve personalized content, and analyze our traffic. Please choose which types of cookies you want to allow.

necessary.title: Necessary Cookies
necessary.details: These cookies are essential for the website and its features to work properly. They cannot be disabled. Including session management, login authentication, and security protection.

analytics.title: Analytics Cookies
analytics.description: Help us understand how you use our site
analytics.details: Used to track page views and user behavior, helping us optimize website experience. These cookies collect and report information anonymously.
analytics.googleDetails: Tracks page views, user behavior, and site usage statistics to help us improve the user experience.
analytics.clarityDetails: Provides heat maps and session recordings to help us understand user behavior and improve website usability.
analytics.plausibleDetails: Privacy-friendly analytics that tracks website usage without collecting personal data.

settingsDescription: Manage your cookie preferences and learn how we use cookies on our website.
infoDescription: Your privacy matters to us. You can change your cookie preferences at any time by visiting this page. We will not send your cookie preferences to our servers or any third parties.
resetConfirm: Are you sure you want to reset your cookie preferences?
withdrawConsentDescription: After withdrawing consent, relevant cookies will be immediately deleted and analytics scripts will stop loading.
